mapper.select: SELECT m1.userId, userName, pwd, NVL(grade, 0) grade, email, tel, postNum, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, addr1, addr2, gender FROM member1 m1 LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM member2 m2 JOIN member1 m1 ON m2.userId=m1.userId

SELECT NVL(count(*),0) FROM( SELECT className, TO_CHAR(startDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') startDate, r.userId, userName, gender, tel, email, postNum, addr1, addr2, TO_CHAR(birth,'YYYY-MM-DD') birth FROM register r JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.userId = r.userId JOIN member2 m2 ON r.userId = m2.userId JOIN dietClass d ON r.classNum = d.classNum
)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member1 (userId, pwd, grade, userName) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pwd}, #{grade}, #{userName})
INSERT INTO member2 (userId, tel, email, postNum, addr1, addr2, birth, gender) VALUES (#{userId}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{postNum}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{birth}, #{gender})
